Reference version 1.0

Data and filtering

Functions for loading, exporting and subsetting the data.

mmload

Data loading function

mmimport

Import data

mmformat_esom

Format raw esom data for use in mmgenome

mmformat_ppsp

Format ppsp data for use in mmgenome

mmsubset

Subset scaffolds

mmadd

Add data to any mmgenome object

mmexport

Exports scaffolds in fasta format

mmref

Compare essential genes in a bin to a group of references

mmstats

Calculates summary statistics on a set of scaffolds

Metagenome plotting and extraction

Functions for plotting and extracting scaffolds

mmplot

Function to visualise metagenomes

mmplot_network

Plots connected scaffolds in a network

mmplot_pairs

Generates a ggplot2 style pairs plot

mmplot_locator

Interactively define a selection subspace on mmplot or mmplot_network

mmplot_selection

Highlight subsets

Extracting/subsetting

Extracting

mmextract

Extracts a subset of scaffolds

mmextract_network

Extract scaffolds connected by paired-end reads
